long_description: With its simple, clean lines, the women's Timbuk2 Express Shoulder Bag makes a stylish alternative to a traditional messenger bag for around-town jaunts. Shoulder strap adjusts to cross-body or over-the-shoulder wear. Top flap is secured with a Velcro(R) closure; front pocket underneath lets you grab items quickly. Main compartment has a mesh water-bottle holder as well as drop-in and zippered pockets. Rear hidden zip pocket has a key fob. The Timbuk2 Express Shoulder Bag is made from nylon or cotton twill, depending on the color.
short_description: With its simple, clean lines, the women's Timbuk2 Express Shoulder Bag makes a stylish alternative to a traditional messenger bag for around-town jaunts.
